name: abai

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wi(w0, w1)))

comment: Introduce one conjunct as an antecedent to the other. "abai" stands for "and, biconditional, and, implication". (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-Dec-2012.)
